Class RobotClient

java.lang.Object
  Client
      LocalClient
          RobotClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RobotClient
extends LocalClient
implements java.lang.Runnable

A very naive implementation of a computer controlled LocalClient. Basically it stumbles about and shoots.

Version:
$Id: RobotClient.java 345 2004-01-24 03:56:27Z geoffw $
Author:
Geoffrey Washburn <geoffw@cis.upenn.edu>

Field Summary
private  boolean active
          Flag to say whether the control thread should be running.
private  java.util.Random randomGen
          Random number generator so that the robot can be "non-deterministic".
private  java.lang.Thread thread
          The Thread object we use to run the robot control code.
